description: Repairs to a propeller mean it will not be able to sail until 11 September, the ferry operator says.
title: Ben-my-Chree Isle of Man ferry out of action for two weeks
title_page: Ben-my-Chree Isle of Man ferry out of action for two weeks - BBC News
maintext: Apologising for the disruption to schedules, Mr Woodward said: "Unfortunately, we have no other option in order to repair the Ben and avoid further disruption to schedules."
